page.title: 14MICK OVERLAND:A FARMER
page.content: {MICK OVERLAND:AN OUTWELL FARMER} Children from Beaupre Community Primary School visited an Outwell farm to interview Mick Overland. He lives in the Cottons area of the village where he owns 9 acres of land and hires 9 other acres. He grows the following crops on his land: Strawberries 2 acres Sugar beet 2 acres Potatoes 1 acre Sweet corn 4 acres Onions 2 acres Barley 6 acres Cabbage/Lettuce 1 acre He sells his potatoes to M&B Distributors of Outwell and his soft fruit to Stokes and Bomford of Wisbech. He makes his biggest profit on the sale of strawberries. He employs 6-18 strawberry pickers in summer.
